password-reset.help: We can send a link to your email that you can use to reset your password. Please enter the email you used to register the account and click submit.

reset-sent.help: Reset link has been sent to the email if an account was registered with this email.

share-dialog.link-help: You can use the link below to share the code to a friend.

editor.confirm-leave: Are you sure you want to leave this page? All unsaved changes will be lost.
editor.confirm-new: You have unsaved changes. These changes will be destroyed if you create new file. Are you sure you want to create a new file?
editor.confirm-load: You have unsaved changes. These changes will be destroyed if you load a file. Are you sure you want to load file?
editor.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete the file? This cannot be undone.
editor.enter-directory-name: Enter name for the new directory.
editor.confirm-delete-directory: Are you sure you want to delete this directory and everything inside it? This cannot be undone.

news.title: News
news.no-news: There aren't any news right now
news.offline: EppaBasic is in a connectionless state. News can not be loaded just now.

errors.sub-return-expr: Sub program return can't have a value
errors.variable-type-or-initial: Definition of variable '__name__' must have either type or initial value
errors.variable-undefined: No variable called '__name__' exists in this scope
errors.array-dimension-integer: Array dimensions must be of type 'Integer'
errors.array-index-integer: Array indices must be of type 'Integer'
errors.for-start-end-type: Loop end and start types must be the same
errors.for-iterator-step-type: Loop step and iterator types must be the same
errors.function-no-match: No function matches for a call '__name__(__params__)'
errors.do-multiple-conditions: Conditions is allowed only at the begining of the loop or at the end, not at both places
errors.binop-undefined: Failed to find operator '__op__' for '__left__' and '__right__'
errors.unnop-undefined: Failed to find unary operator '__op__' for '__type__'
